This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS getDevices returns devices exposed by the DeviceManager service 
PASS getDevices returns the same objects for each USB device 
PASS requestDevice rejects when called without a user gesture 
PASS requestDevice rejects when no device is chosen 
PASS requestDevice returns the device chosen by the user 
PASS getDevices returns the same object as requestDevice 
PASS filters are sent correctly 
PASS onconnect event is trigged by adding a device 
PASS getDevices returns the same object as sent in the onconnect event 
PASS ondisconnect event is triggered by removing a device 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
